main_topic.author: eigenquant
main_topic.title: Question about rule(fine tuning the LLM)
main_topic.content: - Is it okay to do fine tuning the LLM with personal gpu(outside from kaggle) and use it for this competition?

comments.author: Valentin Werner
comments.content: Yes, as long as the LLM and Data you are using is Open source (e.g., MIT, Apache 2.0). You can also rent GPUs and train there, its all fair play.
comments.date: Posted 2 months ago  ·  38th in this Competition

comments.author: yulonghui
comments.content: I want to know What kind of data we can use for fine-tuning?
